explanations.reason: The paper focuses on analyzing the co-movements and diversification benefits between stock returns from Ghana and Jamaica using wavelet analysis, causality in quantiles, and quantile-on-quantile regression (QQR) with variational mode decomposition (VMD). None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or specific neural network techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The methodologies used are statistical and econometric in nature, not involving any machine learning or AI techniques.
